Uses of Class
client.controller.ControllerChain

  • Packages that use ControllerChain 
    Package Description
    client.controller
    responsible for all the controllers

    • Uses of ControllerChain in client.controller

      Subclasses of ControllerChain in client.controller 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoardResponseController
      Tells the client whether the model is locked or not BY SOME OTHER CLIENT.
      class  ConnectResponseController
      Connect Response after receiving the corresponding message from server
      class  EmptyHandler
      responsible for handling error for Chain Repository
      class  ExitGameResponseController
      Controllers to handle the received ExitGameResponse, set Playing panel invisible and exit the java program
      class  FindWordResponseController
      responsible to handle the findWord response from server
      class  JoinGameResponseController
      responsible for handling the response of join game response from server
      class  ListGamesResponseController
      responsible for handling listGamesResponse from server
      class  LockGameResponseController
      responsible for handling the lockGameResponse from server, lock the game when receive the lockGameResponse the LockGameResponseController.process(Message)handle the LockGameResponse, lock the game and set lockGame button grey
      class  ResetGameResponseController
      responsible for handling the resetGame response from server
      Methods in client.controller with parameters of type ControllerChain 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SampleClientMessageHandler.registerHandler(ControllerChain handler)
      Register new controller chain as occuring before existing chain.
